# nixpkgs-fmt

## nixpkgs-fmt documentation

- Visit [Official Web Site](https://nixpkgs-fmt.serokell.io/){target=_blank}
- Docker image: [samcraig/nixpkgs-fmt:latest](https://hub.docker.com/r/samcraig/nixpkgs-fmt){target=_blank}
  - arguments: `-v {{WORKSPACE}}:/tmp/lint:rw`

[![nixpkgs-fmt - GitHub](https://gh-card.dev/repos/serokell/nixpkgs-fmt.svg?fullname=)](https://github.com/serokell/nixpkgs-fmt){target=_blank}

## Configuration in MegaLinter

- Enable nixpkgs-fmt by adding `NIX_NIXPKGS_FMT` in [ENABLE_LINTERS variable](https://megalinter.github.io/configuration/#activation-and-deactivation)
- Disable nixpkgs-fmt by adding `NIX_NIXPKGS_FMT` in [DISABLE_LINTERS variable](https://megalinter.github.io/configuration/#activation-and-deactivation)

- Enable **auto-fixes** by adding `NIX_NIXPKGS_FMT` in [APPLY_FIXES variable](https://megalinter.github.io/configuration/#apply-fixes)

| Variable                                    | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                         | Default value            |
|---------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------|
| NIX_NIXPKGS_FMT_DOCKER_IMAGE_VERSION        | Docker image version                                                                                                                                                                                                | `latest`                 |
| NIX_NIXPKGS_FMT_ARGUMENTS                   | User custom arguments to add in linter CLI call<br/>Ex: `-s --foo "bar"`                                                                                                                                            |                          |
| NIX_NIXPKGS_FMT_FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE        | Custom regex including filter<br/>Ex: `(src\|lib)`                                                                                                                                                                  | Include every file       |
| NIX_NIXPKGS_FMT_FILTER_REGEX_EXCLUDE        | Custom regex excluding filter<br/>Ex: `(test\|examples)`                                                                                                                                                            | Exclude no file          |
| NIX_NIXPKGS_FMT_CLI_LINT_MODE               | Override default CLI lint mode<br/>- `file`: Calls the linter for each file<br/>- `list_of_files`: Call the linter with the list of files as argument<br/>- `project`: Call the linter from the root of the project | `{linter.cli_lint_mode}` |
| NIX_NIXPKGS_FMT_FILE_EXTENSIONS             | Allowed file extensions. `"*"` matches any extension, `""` matches empty extension. Empty list excludes all files<br/>Ex: `[".py", ""]`                                                                             | `[".nix"]`               |
| NIX_NIXPKGS_FMT_FILE_NAMES_REGEX            | File name regex filters. Regular expression list for filtering files by their base names using regex full match. Empty list includes all files<br/>Ex: `["Dockerfile(-.+)?", "Jenkinsfile"]`                        | Include every file       |
| NIX_NIXPKGS_FMT_PRE_COMMANDS                | List of bash commands to run before the linter                                                                                                                                                                      | None                     |
| NIX_NIXPKGS_FMT_POST_COMMANDS               | List of bash commands to run after the linter                                                                                                                                                                       | None                     |
| NIX_NIXPKGS_FMT_DISABLE_ERRORS              | Run linter but consider errors as warnings                                                                                                                                                                          | `true`                   |
| NIX_NIXPKGS_FMT_DISABLE_ERRORS_IF_LESS_THAN | Maximum number of errors allowed                                                                                                                                                                                    | `0`                      |

## IDE Integration

Use nixpkgs-fmt in your favorite IDE to catch errors before MegaLinter !

## Behind the scenes

### How are identified applicable files

- File extensions: `.nix`

<!-- markdownlint-disable -->
<!-- /* cSpell:disable */ -->
### How the linting is performed

- nixpkgs-fmt is called one time by identified file

### Example calls

```shell
`docker run -v {{WORKSPACE}}:/tmp/lint:rw samcraig/nixpkgs-fmt:latest nixpkgs-fmt < input.nix` – reads Nix code form stdin, formats it, and outputs to stdout
```

```shell
`docker run -v {{WORKSPACE}}:/tmp/lint:rw samcraig/nixpkgs-fmt:latest nixpkgs-fmt file.nix` – format the file in place
```

```shell
`docker run -v {{WORKSPACE}}:/tmp/lint:rw samcraig/nixpkgs-fmt:latest nixpkgs-fmt file1.nix file2.nix` – format multiple files
```


### Installation on mega-linter Docker image

None
